<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registertargetmachine">RegisterTargetMachine</a> - Helper template for registering a target machine implementation, for use in the target machine initialization function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registertargetmachine">RegisterTargetMachine</a> - Helper template for registering a target machine implementation, for use in the target machine initialization function.

Usage:
